content: Chapter 2 of Black Myth: Wukong takes place in the arid badlands of the Yellow Wind Ridge, where a mysterious Rat Sage has taken control of the region with his Yaoguai army.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_2-Yellow_Sand,_Desolate_Dusk.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 2 Walkthrough Sections'.
The content is as follows:
Chapter 2 of Black Myth: Wukong takes place in the arid badlands of the Yellow Wind Ridge, where a mysterious Rat Sage has taken control of the region with his Yaoguai army.
